title: Astrolus Premium
description: Modern Sass landing page, supports both light and dark mode, built with TailwindCSS.
fullDescription:
Astrolus Premium

Modern Innovative Sass landing page, supports both light and dark mode, built on top of astro and tailwind css.

The design is both minimal and modern. It is perfect for a SaaS, startup or your next marketing campaign to showcase your business and services.

Sections

The premium version template includes various design sections including :

  • Hero section
  • Features section
  • Solution section
  • Solution products section
  • Solution content section
  • Reviews section
  • Pricing Section
  • Faqs
  • Footer
